title: Ranked MMR
body: Im currently silver 2 71 LP and for some reason im losing 21 LP per loss and gaining 17 LP per win but oce.op.gg says that my solo MMR is currently gold 5? really confused as to why im losing more than gaining

replies.body:
Please don't use a third party site to base your MMR off. Only Riot (and only select few Rioters within Riot) knows how they calculate their MMR  and it has never, and probably will never be public knowledge. 

You currently have a negative winrate so your LP gains and losses would be a little bit out from that. Although it looks like you are doing pretty well at the moment so keep it up and it should even out in no time!
oce.op.gg does not reflect your real MMR/ELO rating. Just a guess.
